article_title: Mr. Obama, I Am Unhappy That Obamacare Threatens To Kill Me

article_metadata.description: To you, Mr. President, this is, maybe, an annoying detail. To me, it is, well, a contingent death sentence.
article_metadata.author: Ralph Benko
